title: Suicide Artist

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On Night 1, choose a role to appear as and a method of death. You will kill yourself and appear as that role and appear to have died in that way.
- If you would somehow be prevented from killing yourself, you will attempt to do so again every following night.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each full moon, if you're dead, reenact your death from the grave. You may attack someone, and they will appear to have been died in the way you chose when you killed yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Die to see the Town lose the game.

desc:
Post 1006
*I'm very experienced in killing myself. I've never once attempted to do it and failed.*
